subject: RE: [junit] Re: How to write the assertion?
msgSnippet: ... And, as one former employee of mine puts it, if your QA team is spending time getting the product to work instead of getting the product to break, you re
messageBody:
> In many cases, when programmers don't test their own code,
> they deliver such low quality work that testers spend their
> time writing and running trivial test cases, driving out
> silly bugs, rather than being allowed to spend their time
> writing interesting tests, driving out the kinds of bugs that
> drive customers crazy.

And, as one former employee of mine puts it, if your
QA team is spending time getting the product to work
instead of getting the product to break, you're in
trouble.


Todd.
